actions.text: Amendment SA 67 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 12.

Amendment SA 67 proposed by Senator Edwards. (consideration:  CR S1171-1195, S1208-1209; text: CR S1174) To require a study of the final rule relating to prevention of significant deterioration and nonattainment new source review to determine the effects of the final rule on air pollution and human health.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 67 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 12.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 67 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 50. Record Vote Number: 12.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 67 proposed by Senator Edwards.

purpose: To require a study of the final rule relating to prevention of significant deterioration and nonattainment new source review to determine the effects of the final rule on air pollution and human health.
